::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
chinook = read_csv(
  file = "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/lugoga/kitaa/main/datasets/chinook_lw.csv")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
Rows: 112 Columns: 3
── Column specification ────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
Delimiter: ","
chr (1): loc
dbl (2): tl, w

ℹ Use `spec()` to retrieve the full column specification for this data.
ℹ Specify the column types or set `show_col_types = FALSE` to quiet this message.
```


:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
chinook
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
# A tibble: 112 × 3
      tl     w loc      
   <dbl> <dbl> <chr>    
 1 120.   17.9 Argentina
 2 115    17.2 Argentina
 3 111.   16.8 Argentina
 4 110.   15.8 Argentina
 5 110    14.3 Argentina
 6 110.   13.8 Argentina
 7 105    12.8 Argentina
 8 100.   11.7 Argentina
 9  98    12.8 Argentina
10  92.1  14.8 Argentina
# ℹ 102 more rows
```


:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
chinook |> glimpse()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
Rows: 112
Columns: 3
$ tl  <dbl> 120.1, 115.0, 111.2, 110.2, 110.0, 109.7, 105.0, 100.1, 98.0, 92.1…
$ w   <dbl> 17.9, 17.2, 16.8, 15.8, 14.3, 13.8, 12.8, 11.7, 12.8, 14.8, 9.7, 7…
$ loc <chr> "Argentina", "Argentina", "Argentina", "Argentina", "Argentina", "…
```


:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(data = chinook, aes(tl)) + 
  geom_histogram(col = 'ivory') +
  geom_vline(xintercept = 81.6, linetype = 2, color = "blue", linewidth = 1.2) +
  geom_vline(xintercept = 78.86, linetype = 2, color = "red", linewidth = 1.2)+
  theme_minimal()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
`stat_bin()` using `bins = 30`. Pick better value with `binwidth`.
```


:::

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](10_stats01_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-5-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::



## central tendency theorem


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
chinook |> psych::describe()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
     vars   n  mean    sd median trimmed   mad  min   max range  skew kurtosis
tl      1 112 78.86 21.89   81.6   80.29 21.57 18.0 120.1 102.1 -0.55    -0.19
w       2 112  6.68  4.37    6.4    6.36  5.04  0.1  17.9  17.8  0.52    -0.50
loc*    3 112  2.12  0.85    2.0    2.16  1.48  1.0   3.0   2.0 -0.24    -1.59
       se
tl   2.07
w    0.41
loc* 0.08
```


:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
chinook |> 
  skimr::skim()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}

Table: Data summary

|                         |        |
|:------------------------|:-------|
|Name                     |chinook |
|Number of rows           |112     |
|Number of columns        |3       |
|_______________________  |        |
|Column type frequency:   |        |
|character                |1       |
|numeric                  |2       |
|________________________ |        |
|Group variables          |None    |


**Variable type: character**

|skim_variable | n_missing| complete_rate| min| max| empty| n_unique| whitespace|
|:-------------|---------:|-------------:|---:|---:|-----:|--------:|----------:|
|loc           |         0|             1|   7|   9|     0|        3|          0|


**Variable type: numeric**

|skim_variable | n_missing| complete_rate|  mean|    sd|   p0|   p25|  p50|   p75|  p100|hist  |
|:-------------|---------:|-------------:|-----:|-----:|----:|-----:|----:|-----:|-----:|:-----|
|tl            |         0|             1| 78.86| 21.89| 18.0| 65.60| 81.6| 94.67| 120.1|▂▂▇▇▃ |
|w             |         0|             1|  6.68|  4.37|  0.1|  2.98|  6.4|  9.48|  17.9|▇▆▆▃▂ |


:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
chinook |> 
  distinct(loc) |>
  pull() 
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] "Argentina" "Petrohue"  "Puyehue"  
```


:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(data = chinook, aes(x = w))+
  geom_histogram(color = "ivory")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
`stat_bin()` using `bins = 30`. Pick better value with `binwidth`.
```


:::

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](10_stats01_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-9-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::





### Measures of the centers


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
rnorm(n = 50, mean = 24, sd = 2.5) |> 
  as_tibble() |> 
  rename(air_temperature = value) |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = air_temperature))+
  geom_histogram(color = "ivory")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
`stat_bin()` using `bins = 30`. Pick better value with `binwidth`.
```


:::

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](10_stats01_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-10-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
rnorm(n = 10000, mean = 24, sd = 2.25) |> 
  as_tibble() |> 
  rename(air_temperature = value) |> 
  as.data.frame() |> 
  psych::describe()
```

```
                vars     n mean   sd median trimmed  mad   min   max range
air_temperature    1 10000   24 2.24  24.03      24 2.25 14.56 32.08 17.52

air_temperature -0.03     0.01 0.02
```
